Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory801.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'A one-day dating ticket? That means we get to spend the whole day together.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I'd definitely like to spend some quiet time with you, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Walking down the street with Rosetta, you see interactive games, laughter, and music fill every possible space.'}
{3: 'Rosetta seems uninterested in any of these until she stops in front of a cafe.'}
{3: 'In block letters, the sign at the entrance reads, "Discover your fortune in coffee groundsâ€”a one-of-a-kind experience in Constellia!"'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Staff', 3: 'Join us here to learn about your future fortune by observing the coffee grounds left in your cup when you finish your coffee.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Staff', 3: 'Are you guys interested in finding out what your coffee grounds have to say about your future?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Fortune-telling with coffee grounds? Sounds quite interesting.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Let's give it a try, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory459.jpg'}
{3: "Following the shop attendant's guidance, you and Rosett enter a booth where a complete set of coffee equipment has been set up on the table."}
{3: 'To your surprise, the only illumination here is candlelight. In the faint glow, you attempt to make out the "Coffee Grounds Divination Manual" you just got from the shop attendant.'}
{3: 'With an extremely serious look on her face, Rosetta pulls the manual from your hands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's too dark here. You're gonna cause your eyes damage if you try to read with the candlelight here.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Don't worry. I got the rules all figured out.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Count on me.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Alright then. Let's give the coffee a try first.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'When Rosetta gently pours hot water over the ground coffee, it gives off an aroma that soothes you like a gentle embrace.'}
{3: 'Taking the coffee Rosetta hands you, you sip it and taste a richness unlike anything you have tasted before.'}
{2: 'You sure make good coffee.', 3: '35'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Do I? Well, I don't get that a lot...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "But I guess I'm no stranger to this since I used to brew pine needle tea all the time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "According to the manual, we're supposed to swirl the cup now. Let's do it together, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'You reach out and hold the coffee cup.', 3: '40'}
{3: 'Her slender fingers guide your hand as she places the saucer over the coffee cup and starts swirling it gently.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Now, Commandant, please close your eyes.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySlowlyCloseEye.prefab'}
{3: 'You close your eyes as told. With her hand over yours, you can feel the warmth coming from her fingertips.'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Let's see what the coffee grounds have to say.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'With it, Rosetta flips the saucer over and lifts the cup.'}
{3: 'The coffee grounds at the bottom of the cup have formed a smooth, perfect circle from the swirling.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: '1', 3: "When you open your eyes and meet Rosetta's gaze, you see that she's now wearing a much softer demeanor."}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'We have a circle, and according to what I just read in the manual... circles are usually signs of good fortune.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Which is pretty accurate, since you're always super lucky, Commandant.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'And you seem to bring hope and good fortune to those around you wherever you go.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'And your courage and support would definitely keep me going...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "It's my turn now...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She drains the coffee in one go and swirls the cup following the same procedure as before.'}
{3: 'As she bows her head and closes her eyes, the flickering candlelight casts the shadows of her eyelashes across her cheeks.'}
{3: 'When Rosetta opens her eyes to look at the coffee grounds in the cup, she seems a little surprised.'}
{3: 'In her cup, the coffee grounds have formed an exceptionally perfect circle.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Rosetta', 3: "Guess I'm exceptionally lucky today.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: 'Because I have you right by my side, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Rosetta', 3: "I will always remember this moment in the days to come, Commandant, whether you're physically next to me or not.", 4: '1'}
